Company Notes

  

Alaska Airlines has just been added to our 2009 Airline program! 

Check the Travel Lounge on the company portal for more exciting news Alaska Vacations packages....and oh so much more!  As a reminder, your preferred airlines are Northwest/Delta, United Airlines, Alaska--secondary carriers are American and Continental.

 

Safe travels everybody....if you need urgent assistance from your travel team please email to traveladministrator@concur.com and I'll respond as quickly as I am able.  Best hours to reach me are between 6am-6pm PST. --Jen Alford

Phone number for Travel Inc. 1-866-712-2801  or  1-813-876-4101

 

 Information on Concur's Corporate Travel Policy can be found on the Portal in the Corporate Travel Lounge.

Reminder:

If traveling to Redmond, Alexandria, Eden Prairie or Reston offices please submit a Help Desk Ticket requesting building access. Please be sure to include your badge number on the request. You can find your badge number on the back of your badge.

Parking Information:

When traveling to the Redmond office a parking pass will be required to avoid being ticketed in our parking lot. Please print a pass in advance from the Facilities Web on the Concur Portal, or pick one up from the front desk upon arrival. Please make sure you date the pass for your entire stay.

If you are driving to the Alexandria office, Robin Farrell has parking stickers for the lot behind the building.
